experience.title: Zscaler
experience.location: Sahibzada Ajit Singh Nagar, Punjab, India

positions.subtitle: Zscaler
positions.description: Working to bring world class solutions to life for the engineers of the organisation. From Development to DevOps, the area of work impacts 100% engineering teams of the organisation.- Worked as a Developer to build an application that can trigger a deployment and its regression test with just 3 clicks. Being used by every client facing team at Zscaler. - The above mentioned tool, finds over 40 issues every hour, thereby saving company resources in bug hunting and reduces dependency on manual testing.- Working as a DevSecOps Engineer to support the engineer teams and ease their experience.- Working on onboarding, testing and migrating data to a tool that consolidates functionalities served by a distributed set of tools into a single application. Thereby saving company costs and reducing the learning curve of a developer.- Working on automating support ticket queues, to reduce human intervention and decrease the Mean Time To Resolve to the industry best of under 5 hours which is a 95% improvement.
positions.title: Software Development Engineer
positions.description_html:
Working to bring world class solutions to life for the engineers of the organisation. From Development to DevOps, the area of work impacts 100% engineering teams of the organisation.

- Worked as a Developer to build an application that can trigger a deployment and its regression test with just 3 clicks. Being used by every client facing team at Zscaler.
- The above mentioned tool, finds over 40 issues every hour, thereby saving company resources in bug hunting and reduces dependency on manual testing.
- Working as a DevSecOps Engineer to support the engineer teams and ease their experience.
- Working on onboarding, testing and migrating data to a tool that consolidates functionalities served by a distributed set of tools into a single application. Thereby saving company costs and reducing the learning curve of a developer.
- Working on automating support ticket queues, to reduce human intervention and decrease the Mean Time To Resolve to the industry best of under 5 hours which is a 95% improvement.

experience.title: Salesforce Developer
experience.description: Worked on Salesforce Developer CRM Platform, that helps in efficiently increasing the ease of doing business by up to 50%. Developed several dashboards for automation of sales and service that carried features such as Leads, Potential Leads in Sales and Deals that were won, closed or lost.

experience.title: Data Analyst Intern
experience.description: Built a Machine Learning Model that accurately predicts a student's score based on the effort they've put in. The Model carried an accuracy of 93% and could correctly predict for almost all test cases.
